education.description: Majored in Advanced Process Engineering with a thesis in numerical modeling of homogeneous catalytic reactions in fractals. Specialization: Advanced Process Engineering
Participated in Honours Programme. (Bachelor’s (Honours) in Chemical Engineering)
Summer School for Honours Programme in Barcelona, investigating the social impact of superblocks (Superilles) in Barcelona.

roles.title: Platform Engineer
bulletPoints: Learning Helm, terragrunt (terraform), git, kubernetes, aws iam.
Improved engineers experience on terragrunt/helmfile plans and applies by optimizing deployment instance of atlantis (pull request automation tool).
Reduced downstream errors in LoadBalancer reconciliation by implementing a certificate check before any helmfile deployments involving addition or modification of ingress hosts.
Reduced alert fatigue from PagerDuty by lowering severity levels of non-critical alerts and removing non-actionable alerts.

roles.title: Sales Operations Manager
bulletPoints: Drastically increased CRM hygiene, as well as internal sales and business lines alignment by implementing an operating cadence with structured agendas and Tableau dashboards in Salesforce.

Reduced sales budget planning time to 3 workshop days by designing a budgeting process involving four phases: (1) Top-down business plan, (2) bottom-up forecasting, (3) initiative suggestions, (4) shortlisting of initiatives.
Achieved 90% reduction in finance team reporting labor by developing a Power BI model for margin deviation analysis automation.
Enhanced Tableau Cloud efficiency by increasing flow refresh frequency from daily to hourly using a Python script with Selenium, saving €20,000 annually on data management licenses.
Established a single point of truth in company data by consolidating 1400+ SKUs and 1000+ revenue accounts, enhancing global data governance.
Enabled hourly-refreshed monitoring of Lead Generation through to Customer Success by building 'North-Star' company-wide dashboards in Tableau, integrated in Salesforce.
Implemented a Salesforce CRM module in Apex and JavaScript for real-time sales forecasts, significantly reducing manual Excel tracking.
Designed and Implemented a Sales Target Allocation system allowing sales reps and directors to accurately track performance and bonuses.

roles.title: Process Engineer and Data Analyst Trainee
bulletPoints: Massively reduced (96%) manual labor of data processing, saving €30,000+ per year by developing a Python ETL pipeline and daily Production KPIs app (visualized in Plotly/Power BI).
Boosted production to 60,000 kg/year with an OEE increase from 35% to 75%, saving €15,000+ by improving equipment efficiency.
Reduced production waste by 10% on highest throughput line (200,000 kg/yr) via root-cause analysis on diameter spread issues.
Redesigned KPI reporting pipeline for diverse business processes, automating data collection and analysis.
Enabled automatic generation of Packaging Label for 600+ products by building a master product database in Excel.

roles.title: Permanent Improvement Programme Intern
bulletPoints: Boosted revenue by €200,000 for a cluster of UK laboratories via a customer profitability model developed in Excel.
Developed a project tracker for 350+ projects, visualized in Power BI.
Translated data into actionable insights for margin and productivity enhancement.
Assisted in annual operational budgeting for multiple labs.

roles.title: Head Mentor/Teaching Assistant
bulletPoints: Mentored 12 bachelor students, offering academic and technical guidance.
Conducted regular chemistry lessons and supervised lab courses.

roles.title: Student Lab Assistant
bulletPoints: Assisted 120+ students in chemical sample analysis using NMR.
Provided expert insights on over 700 NMR samples.

roles.title: Treasurer for Beach Committee
bulletPoints: Managed an annual budget exceeding €8000 for the Kroton Beach Volleyball Tournament.
Oversaw financial record-keeping, ensuring transparency in cash flows.

projects.name: Personal Website
bulletPoints: My website built with react/next.js for all things about me.
Templates and styling is done using tailwind css.

projects.name: Freelance Time Tracker
bulletPoints: A tool built using Flask with MongoDB backend to track clients, projects, and time logs with automatic invoice generation.
Templates and styling is done using tailwind css.

projects.name: Sales Forecasting Model
bulletPoints: A sales forecasting tool using facebook's Prophet model as underlying predictor.
Has built-in feature to authenticate with Salesforce Connected App for fetching forecast data to compare with Prophet Model forecast.
Sales data need to be supplied locally.

projects.name: Keyboard Inputs Tracker (Windows)
bulletPoints: Track keys pressed on keyboard with a python-tkinter based GUI app.

projects.name: Chatbot with RAG
bulletPoints: Chatbot developed using streamlit for UI leveraging OpenAI Models and Pinecone as vector database for RAG implementation.
Can be tested locally with OpenAI API key and Pinecone API key.

projects.name: NBA Data Scraper Package (PyPI)
bulletPoints: A tool built in Python to scrape a basketball website for shot data from NBA games (using BeautifulSoup).
Tested and published to PyPI using GitHub actions and poetry.

projects.name: Investment Analysis Platform
bulletPoints: Developed a Python-based website (streamlit) for investment analysis using financial reporting API and SEC Database.
SEC Filings data is stored in MongoDB, retrievable via a built-in SEC Scraper.
Included a DCF calculator with custom inputs based on DCF parameters.
Hosted on Azure App Service (F1 tier) with CI/CD (GitHub Actions) - https://sec-scraper.azurewebsites.net/SEC_Scraper

projects.name: NBA API
bulletPoints: Designed a database (MS SQL) to store NBA shots data (+4.5 million rows self-scraped) — shots taken, teams, players, positions, team arenas, and games played from 2000-2023.
Developed endpoints using FastAPI to access the database.

projects.name: Expense Tracker WebApp with Flask
bulletPoints: Login functionality for user to add/edit/remove expenses.
Dashboard for visualizing expenses.
All data stored in an Azure SQL Database.

projects.name: Personal Projects
bulletPoints: Practiced machine learning on UCSI datasets with Python libraries.
Experimenting with different tools (sympy, numpy, scipy, airflow, huggingface, langchain, openai, sklearn).
Grocery API Integration: Tracked grocery bonuses and generated recipe-based shopping lists.
Heat Transfer Modelling: Conducted numerical modeling of 1D/2D heat transfer using Finite Difference Analysis.
